mapper.select: SELECT id, ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ENTP_SEQ, ENTP_NAME, CHART, ITEM_IMAGE, PRINT_FRONT, PRINT_BACK, DRUG_SHAPE, COLOR_CLASS1, COLOR_CLASS2, LINE_FRONT, LINE_BACK, LENG_LONG, LENG_SHORT, THICK, IMG_REGIST_TS, CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, ETC_OTC_NAME, ITEM_PERMIT_DATE, FORM_CODE_NAME, MARK_CODE_FRONT_ANAL, MARK_CODE_BACK_ANAL, MARK_CODE_FRONT_IMG, MARK_CODE_BACK_IMG, ITEM_ENG_NAME, CHANGE_DATE, MARK_CODE_FRONT, MARK_CODE_BACK, EDI_CODE FROM MdcinGrnIdntfcInfoList
mapper.insert: insert into MdcinGrnIdntfcInfoList ( ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ENTP_SEQ, ENTP_NAME, CHART, ITEM_IMAGE, PRINT_FRONT, PRINT_BACK, DRUG_SHAPE, COLOR_CLASS1, COLOR_CLASS2, LINE_FRONT, LINE_BACK, LENG_LONG, LENG_SHORT, THICK, IMG_REGIST_TS, CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, ETC_OTC_NAME, ITEM_PERMIT_DATE, FORM_CODE_NAME, MARK_CODE_FRONT_ANAL, MARK_CODE_BACK_ANAL, MARK_CODE_FRONT_IMG, MARK_CODE_BACK_IMG, ITEM_ENG_NAME, CHANGE_DATE, MARK_CODE_FRONT, MARK_CODE_BACK, EDI_CODE ) values ( #{ITEM_SEQ}, #{ITEM_NAME}, #{ENTP_SEQ}, #{ENTP_NAME}, #{CHART}, #{ITEM_IMAGE}, #{PRINT_FRONT}, #{PRINT_BACK}, #{DRUG_SHAPE}, #{COLOR_CLASS1}, #{COLOR_CLASS2}, #{LINE_FRONT}, #{LINE_BACK}, #{LENG_LONG}, #{LENG_SHORT}, #{THICK}, #{IMG_REGIST_TS}, #{CLASS_NO}, #{CLASS_NAME}, #{ETC_OTC_NAME}, #{ITEM_PERMIT_DATE}, #{FORM_CODE_NAME}, #{MARK_CODE_FRONT_ANAL}, #{MARK_CODE_BACK_ANAL}, #{MARK_CODE_FRONT_IMG}, #{MARK_CODE_BACK_IMG}, #{ITEM_ENG_NAME}, #{CHANGE_DATE}, #{MARK_CODE_FRONT}, #{MARK_CODE_BACK}, #{EDI_CODE} )
